cpit380practice

Class WhisperBalloon

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpit380practice.TextBalloon
      • cpit380practice.SpeechBalloon
        • cpit380practice.WhisperBalloon

  • public class WhisperBalloon
extends SpeechBalloon
    Class to show a whisper balloon which is used in a comic panel to show that a character is whispering. The outline of the balloon is dashed and the text is small and plain.
